attributes.action: Legalise use of medical marijuana for chronic pain and other conditions.
attributes.additional_details:
Multiple Sclerosis in UK - 127,000 people with MS (203.4 per 100,000 population). Each year 6,000 people are newly diagnosed (9.64 per 100,000/year).

Cancer in UK - 360,000 people in the UK are diagnosed every year

Half of UK population 'will get cancer in lifetime' - http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-22796220
attributes.background:
Hundreds of scientific studies and thousands of testimonials from patients have established that medical marijuana can relieve certain types of pain, nausea, vomiting and other symptoms caused by such illnesses as multiple sclerosis, cancer...

Marijuana is less toxic than many drugs in the market
